name: LAB706
description:
LAB706 is a co-op platform game where you have to arrive at the end in less time possible. The rules are simple: collaborate with your friend to reach the end and make your best! But wait, one last thing: players have different controls!

LAB706 was made in just one week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1.

PLAYER 1 CONTROLS:

A , D = Move

W = Jump

S = Use switches

PLAYER 2 CONTROLS:

RIGHT/LEFT ARROWS = Move

DOWN ARROW = Grab/Throw

CREDITS:

Programming and level design: niftyDuck;

Graphics and music: Whatever.GFX
